title: Any Help On What Font This Is Please?
author: powpow

comments.content:
It must be **[Sign Painter (HouseScript)](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417193405/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=House-Industries&ffam=SignPainter%20-%20HouseScript&fid=9468b1802a14f543fd8177dcac8171ae&fsize=60&text=the%20Trap%20Room&fit=1)** by House Industries

------------------  
I found it using "Find my Font": [http://www.findmyfont.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417193405/http:/www.findmyfont.com/ "http://www.findmyfont.com")
